messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] YET ANOTHER WEBSITE??
messages.msgSnippet: He says he has a PHD from Harvard on his College department website. I would like to think he didnt rip anything off, if he did the plagarism page on his site
messages.messageBody:
He says he has a PHD from Harvard on his College department website. I would like to think he didnt rip anything off, if he did the plagarism page on his site would be ironic.


Maikeru

Barry Thomas <warlord@...> wrote:
Dear All,

Whilst looking for one thing another often pops up in its place!!! This site seems a little (...put in your chosen word...) and I hope the content isn't pinched from anywhere:

http://brian.hoffert.faculty.noctrl.edu/TEACHING/Samurai.html

Regards,
Barry Thomas.
